name: Price Gecky - Price Oracle
description: AI agent that provides real-time cryptocurrency market data using CoinGecko Pro. Supports token price lookups, newly listed tokens discovery, and top gainers/losers tracking.

skills.name: Token Price Lookup
skills.description: Get the current price for any cryptocurrency token using CoinGecko data.
examples: What is the price of Bitcoin?

skills.name: Newly Listed Tokens
skills.description: Discover recently listed tokens on CoinGecko.

skills.name: Top Gainers & Losers
skills.description: Get the top gaining and losing tokens in the last 24 hours.
examples: What are the top gainers today?
